gl_Position.summary: Contains the position of the current vertex.
gl_Position.name: gl_Position

gl_PointSize.summary: Contains size of rasterized points, in pixels.
gl_PointSize.name: gl_PointSize

gl_FragCoord.summary: Contains the window-relative coordinates of the current fragment.
gl_FragCoord.name: gl_FragCoord

gl_FrontFacing.summary: Indicates whether a primitive is front or back facing.
gl_FrontFacing.name: gl_FrontFacing

gl_PointCoord.summary: Contains the coordinate of a fragment within a point.
gl_PointCoord.name: gl_PointCoord

gl_FragColor.summary: Writing to gl_FragColor specifies the fragment color that will be used by the subsequent fixed functionality pipeline.
gl_FragColor.name: gl_FragColor

gl_FragData.summary: The variable gl_FragData is an array. Writing to gl_FragData[n] specifies the fragment data that will be used by the subsequent fixed functionality pipeline for data n. The array's length is gl_MaxDrawBuffers.
gl_FragData.name: gl_FragData

gl_VertexID.summary: Contains the index of the current vertex.
gl_VertexID.name: gl_VertexID

gl_InstanceID.summary: Contains the index of the current primitive in an instanced draw command.
gl_InstanceID.name: gl_InstanceID

gl_FragDepth.summary: Establishes a depth value for the current fragment.
gl_FragDepth.name: gl_FragDepth
